articles.author: Jacob Paul
articles.title: EU scrambles to keep up with UK in new wind farm push: 'Need more!' - Daily Express
articles.description: THE EU is scrambling to keep up with the UK's significant progress in offshore wind after the European Parliament demanded that the bloc rapidly scales up the energy source so it can meet climate targets on schedule.
